analysis.description:

	-transfer (/unique_chucks/42/0xb0c7f5f420c9f7905e591b182ea86f5cd1f06196.sol#83-86)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/42/0xb0c7f5f420c9f7905e591b182ea86f5cd1f06196.sol:

	 - buy (/unique_chucks/42/0xb0c7f5f420c9f7905e591b182ea86f5cd1f06196.sol#69-74)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
